body_html:
I think you have your label map and TF record paths mixed up:

train_input_reader {
  label_map_path: "/home/zachary_mostowsky/rev20180614/xview_train_mapped_id-1.record"
  tf_record_input_reader {
    input_path: "/home/zachary_mostowsky/rev20180614/label_map.pbtxt"
  }
}

label_map_path should be "**/*.pbtxt", while input_path should be "**/*.record". They are mixed up in your config.
